entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Running Test.cmd causes lots of unit tests to fail #71386
  • Fix file-name to ID-mapping code in solution. #71384
  • CallerArgumentExpression does not capture null-forgiving operator #71390
  • Delegate creation can result in a delegate violating semantics of an `in` parameter. #71383
  • Partially closed generic type name is not parsed correctly when first type argument is missing #71379
  • `()` is not parsed as empty tuple type in type argument list of method call #71378
  • Abstract static members are not supported by runtime binder, but no error is reported at compile time #71375

Closed

  • Offer 'use collection expressions' even in locations that change semantics #70996
    Backlog
  • In c# code cleanup, How to stop visual studio 2022 adding comments /* Unmerged change from project 'xxxx (net6.0)' #71381
  • `foreach` should support types with multiple `IEnumerable<T>` implementations if there is one implementation all can be converted to #71387
  • IDE0005 codefix could remove empty pragma #71382
  • VSTHRD004 is misreported #71377
  • MSBuildWorkspace fails to load legal project, leading to downstream symbol resolution issues. #50112
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions: use iteration type for convertibility of element types #71397
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Break Solution-checksums into a checksums for pure-state vs source-generator state #71396
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Call GetURI when getting a URI for a document #71395
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Features core tests #71394
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove unused enum values #71393
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove WPF dependencies from Workspace and Features test layers #71392
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: OOP calls with different snapshots. #71391
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • PR feedback and cleanup after solution-state/compilation-state refactoring. #71389
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use IHotReloadLogger service to log message whenever EnC is disabled #71385
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Unit test layering #71376
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Offer use-collection-expr when targeting interfaces #71373
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Extract compilation-tracker/SG-production code out of SolutionState to a new owner. #71257
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #68771
    Area-IDE
  • Use CPS for tests where saving documents needs to be reliable #70983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Inline Rename] Update the UI related to Copilot #71332
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize singleton list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #71147
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Support code folding for argument lists #71064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Only apply one document info change for linked documents #71220
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add handling of params collections for natural delegate types #71334
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and… #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use runtime helper `CreateSpan` for `stackalloc` of non-byte arrays #71261
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
